NOT_MOVE_ELEVATOR:
Pressing the button does nothing.

CHOICE_MOVE_UP_OR_DOWN: The elevator is running. Would you like to use it? Ė
MOVE_NORTH_ELEVATOR: The elevator is running. Would you like to use it? Ă
RESISTANCE_WOMAN_A_MSG_005:
̂The Monster GP is just getting started.
Do you think I'd be cut out to participate?
ā
It just seems so fun, don't you think? Simply
watching just won't do it for me.
DISC_SYSTEM_MSG_001: ̂The Disc Machine is operational, and at your service. This device is exclusively for the use of Monster Masters.
DISC_SYSTEM_MSG_002:
̂You can use a MAP Disc to venture into another virtual world.
ā
In these worlds, you'll encounter rare monsters and even rare items.
ā
If you ever find a MAP Disc, feel free to insert it into this machine any time.
ā
Would you like to use the Disc Machine?Ă
DISC_SYSTEM_END_MSG:
̂Welcome back. How was your adventure in the other world?
ā
Just so you know, Discs will regain their energy overtime...
ā
However, you may also charge their energy by paying with gold.
ā
I hope to see you again soon.
DISC_SYSTEM_MSG_003: ̂Would you like to use a MAP disc to venture off into another world?Ă
AROMA_MSG_001:
̂Insert Gaia into Code3 on the disc machine and try making a disc.
ā
When you're done, show it to me. I'll check it for you.
AROMA_MSG_002:
̂To find Attihocc's Ring, enter the keywords God of Land.
ā
For Wadatsumi's Ring, enter God of Sea.
ā
For Hoakari's Ring, enter God of Sky.
ā
Obtain all 3 in any order, and then come speak with me.
ā
If you have too much trouble with a disc, simply recreate it.
ā
Changing a few keywords can really make a difference.
SYSTEM_MSG_001_01:
Let's go show Attihocc's Ring to Aroma. 
She's waiting for you in the Centre Building's basement.
SYSTEM_MSG_001_02:
Let's go show Wadatsumi's Ring to Aroma.
She's waiting for you in the Centre Building's basement.
SYSTEM_MSG_001_03:
Let's go show Hoakari's Ring to Aroma.
She's waiting for you in the Centre Building's basement.
AROMA_MSG_003:
̂Well, how about that... It looks like you found one of
the accessories we needed.
ā
Take that ring back to Dr. Lucia's lab, at Ground Zero.
ā
Once there, I'll open the door leading to that respective Gods'
worm-hole gate, where you must defeat them.
AROMA_MSG_004:
Take that back to Dr. Lucia's lab, at Ground Zero.
ā
̂Once there, I'll open the door leading to that respective Gods'
worm-hole gate, where you must defeat them.
ā
Did you need to hear the keywords again, to find the
remaining rings?
Ă
AROMA_MSG_004_YES:
̂Alright, let's go over it once more.
ā
To find Attihocc's Ring, enter "God of Land".
ā
To find Wadatsumi's Ring, enter "God of Sea".
ā
And finally, to find Hoakari's Ring, enter "God of Sky".
MSG_RAQ_010:
́It's a pleasure to meet you. I am the
Archaeologist and Scholar, Ruboro.
ā
AROMA_MSG_004_NO: ̂Oh, yeah? Well, let's get a move on, then.
SYSTEM_MSG_001_04:
Let's go show Attihocc's Ring to Aroma.
She's waiting for you at Ground Zero.
RESISTANCE_WOMAN_A_REC: ̄A surviving female member of the Humans' Resistance.
RENATE_BEAST_REBORN_MSG:
̂I reconsidered that power when
Mother was wreaking havoc carefully.
ā
The wild Incarnii must all be here, in our
Break World! I know I'm right.
SYSTEM_MSG_001_05:
Let's go show Wadatsumi's Ring to Aroma. 
She's waiting for you at Ground Zero.
SYSTEM_MSG_001_06:
Let's go show Hoakari's Ring to Aroma.
She's waiting for you at Ground Zero.
REC_SHOP_MSG_001:
́Howdy! Aroma told me to keep an eye over the 
place, while she stepped out fer a lil' bit!
ā
She got me up to speed. Lemme know all about them passwords,
an' discs, she did!
ā
Speakin' o' which, I reckon you'll be wantin' to know about the
keywords fer makin' those discs, eh?Ă
REC_SHOP_MSG_002:
́I reckon you'll be wantin' to know about the
keywords fer makin' those discs, eh?Ă
CITIZEN_MAN_A_DEMO_908_AFT_MSG:
́I was surprised to hear that the incarnii
and Djinn transformed into Nochora via Mother's rampage.
ā
Aroma feels terrible that they caused the Djinn
to be revived, but who knew, y'know?
ā
Nobody would've imagined in their wildest dreams
that king was the King of the Demon Realm.
REC_SHOP_MSG_YES:
́Let's see, now... to find Attihocc's Ring, just enter the words, God of Land.
ā
To find Wadatsumi's Ring, just enter the words, God of Sea.
ā
Finally, to find Hoakari's Ring, just enter the words God of Sky!
REC_SHOP_MSG_NO:
́Alrighty, then. You ever feel stuck, just mosey
on over here, an' lemme know.
REC_SHOP_MSG_003: ́You can use the Disc Machine as much as you like. You have the King's permission.
AROMA_MSG_005:
̂I've been eagerly awaiting your arrival. However, I'd prefer
if we go somewhere a little more private...
ā
How about... you meet me up on the rooftop. Do you mind if we
continue this conversation up there?Ă
CITIZEN_CHILD_A_DEMO_908_AFT_MSG:
̂Hey, uh…… The Djinn an' that
meteorite vanished, y'know? I wonder why?
AROMA_MSG_005_YES: ̂Great. Let's head up there right away, then.
AROMA_MSG_005_NO: ̂Fine... but I'm not saying another word until we have more privacy.
CITIZEN_WOMAN_MSG_001: ̂Oh, dear... Have you seen my hubby, or my little boy?
NOCHO_B_MSG_001:
́With the humans recent return, we've been so busy
around here!
REC_SHOP_MSG_004:
́His majesty has granted you permission to use the disc machine, 
freely as you please!
RESISTANCE_MAN_A_MSG_001:
́Never in my wildest dreams, did I think I'd set foot inside this
building, let alone this lab, ever again.
ā
This is all thanks to you, Anses... Ah, I mean, ȁ!
RESISTANCE_WOMAN_A_MSG_001:
̂It isn't so much your physical look that reminds me of Anses,
so much as the vibe you put out.
ā
I'm sure your older brother would be proud of the Monster Master
that you've become.
RENATE_MSG_002:
̂A message was recorded
for you…… In your reactor?
ā
The remains of Aroma are below……?
Wow…… I want to check it out too.
ā
The elevator will take you to
basement level 2…… Let's go.
CITIZEN_CHILD_A_SPEED_CLEAR_AFT_MSG:
̂I feel like all the
monsters outside're a bit nice now.
ā
Why's that? Sure is strange, y'know?
CITIZEN_WOMAN_MSG_003:
̂They discovered a second
basement? I wonder what's there?
NOCHO_B_MSG_002:
́We haven't explored it at all yet, but the elevator leading to
the B2 level recently came back online.
ā
Would you mind heading down there first, to make sure it's
safe for us to explore, ȁ?
RESISTANCE_MAN_A_MSG_002:
́Ironically, the B2 level elevator reactivated, the same time
that Aroma departed for our home planet...
RESISTANCE_WOMAN_A_MSG_002:
̂After all this time, I'm still finding new areas in this building...
Could this be the work of Aroma?
CITIZEN_WOMAN_MSG_004:
̂Huh? I wanted to check out the
Monsters GP…… But I got the wrong floor.
NOCHO_B_MSG_003:
́Interesting... so Aroma kept her clone down there, along
with a whole arena...
ā
That's nuts! I have got to go see this!
RESISTANCE_MAN_A_MSG_003:
́That Aroma sure is something else... Now all we can think about
is competing in Masters' GP.
ā
I'm a bit rusty, but I used to be a Monster Master. 
Let's see what I can do in there!
RESISTANCE_WOMAN_A_MSG_003:
̂Hmm, so the Masters' GP is back...
Perhaps, I too shall participate?
ā
It looks like such a blast. Watching the Great Riders' Cup
matches just aren't cutting it anymore!

NPC_AROMA_REC: ̄A girl that was impersonating Lucia. She is a rather intelligent, beautiful, young apprentice scientist.
NPC_RENATE_REC: ̄She was once Anses's main partner. Now she's the overseer of the underground Resistance lab for Anses clones.
NPC_NOCHO_MEN_REC:
̄A male of the Nochoro species.
They are quite curious and friendly in nature.
NPC_NOCHO_WOMEN_REC:
̄A female of the Nochoro species.
They are shy and quite cautious.
CITIZEN_WOMAN_REC:
̄Ordinary human female child who recently was a from deep, 
cryogenically induced sleep, within the Core.
NPC_RUBORO_REC:
̄DQMJ2 Scholar. Valued reseraching
monsters more than their own life.
MSG_ESTARK_030:
́You can purify evil auras with the
symbol of holy power, %ls.
ā
I saw it on the first floor, but I do not recall
who it was.
ā
Visit me again if you do find it!
NPC_CITIZEN_MAN_A_REC:
̄Ordinary human male who recently was a from deep, 
cryogenically induced sleep, within the Core.
REC_POINT_01_02: ̄An elevator controlled by the gravitational device. It will let you visit floors both above and below.
REC_POINT_02_02: ̄A super-core processing computer that can analyze anything in an instant.
REC_POINT_03_02: ̄A device used to simulate a stunning virtual, life-like worlds based on the data recorded on a disc.
MSG_RAQ_ALLCLEAR_2ND:
́It looks like I will learn much
from the documents you collected.
ā
Thank you!
MSG_RAQ_015:
́I am traveling the world
researching the roots of monsters.
ā
I came here to help Tiko, but I was
surprised what amazing places you have here!
ā
The best research facility is one that makes
it easy to cross over to other worlds!
ā
Anyway. I wonder if there is research
about the roots of monsters here?
ā
I beg of you!
If you find any, let me look at them!
ā
MSG_RAQ_020:
́Hello, ȁ.
ā
Have you found any documents that
describe the roots of monsters?
ā
MSG_RAQ_CLEAR_020:
́Wow! You have the
%ls and %ls!
ā
I beg of you! Let me look at those!
I will give you %ls!Ă
MSG_RAQ_CLEAR_YES:
́Thank you!
You're quite the gentleman!
ā
I'll give you this monster in return.
MSG_RAQ_NOTCLEAR:
́I'm looking forward to getting them from
you as I will give you a monster
ā
in return for letting me look at the documents.
MSG_RAQ_CLEAR_NO:
́N-N-No! How could you……
ā
Please change your mind.
I've waited so, so, so long for this!
MSG_RAQ_NOTHAVE:
́Isn't that the
%ls!?
ā
Yes! But it is not complete. Without
the other set I cannot……
ā
I'm sorry, ȁ.
Please come again when you have both.
ā
This shiny %ls
will be waiting for you then, right!
ā
MSG_RAQ_CLEARED:
́Keep on bringing me documents
about the roots of monsters.
ā
This really useful monster will be
waiting for you when you do, right!
MSG_RAQ_ALLCLEAR_1ST:
́And now you have all
the monsters I gave you!
ā
I will be able to learn many things thanks
to the documents you collected.
ā
Thank you!
MSG_RAQ_NOT_EMPTY:
Storage is full.
Let's free some space.
CITIZEN_CHILD_A_MSG_002:
̂My first impression of the Ace was pretty bad. He was a little intimidated.
ā
He's actually pretty friendly, though, the more we talk.
He's certainly growing on me!
MSG_ESTARK_010:
́What's the matter, ȁ?
Are you searching for something?
ā
……Yes. You are searching for an item
that will purify evil auras.
ā
I believe that you can do that the symbol
of holy power, %ls.
ā
MSG_ESTARK_020:
́Yes! I do remember seeing someone
who had the %ls!
ā
I'm sure I saw them on the first floor, but
I don't remember who it was.
ā
Visit me again once you find the
%ls!
MSG_ESTARK_040:
́I can tell, ȁ!
You found the %ls, right?
ā
……Yes. You found it alright, but
it seems to have lost its power……?
ā
Worry not! I will look into this for
you as it concerns me as well.
ā
I heard that our world warps space-time and
connects to a different world.
ā
And not only that, there is a dimension
where holy power is abundant!
ā
I believe that you will find a way to
restore the %ls there!
RESISTANCE_WOMAN_A_MSG_004:
̂Something big is going on up there.
I wanted to go check it out too.
ā
It's not like we can't sit idly by
while he's being chased by a monster, right?
MSG_ESTARK_050:
́I heard that our world warps space-time and
connects to a different world.
ā
And not only that, there is a dimension
where holy power is abundant!
ā
I believe that you will find a way to
restore the %ls there!
RESISTANCE_MAN_A_MSG_004:
́I thought I'd try to check
out a meteor or two on the roof, but……
ā
I was found by a mosnter, and
had to flee before I could see any.
CITIZEN_WOMAN_MSG_002:
̂I don't know anything 'cause I was
just standing here. I guess I lucked out!
RESISTANCE_MAN_A_MSG_005:
́The 2nd floor basement is unlocked
at last. You should confirm it for yourself.
RESISTANCE_MAN_A_MSG_006:
́The 2nd floor basement is unlocked
at last. I was a Scout long ago too.
ā
All this makes me want to fight again!
I bet I could teach you a thing or two!
RESISTANCE_MAN_A_MSG_BY_CROW:
́Oh, right. When I was being chased
by monsters I found a scrap of a map.
ā
I'll give it to you because I can't make heads
nor tails of it. Maybe you'll find a use for it.
NPC_CITIZEN_CHILD_A_REC:
̄Ordinary human child who recently was a from deep, 
cryogenically induced sleep, within the Core.
CITIZEN_MAN_A_MSG_001:
́I want to travel the world with my son. I feel...
like there's so much I've yet to see.
CITIZEN_CHILD_A_MSG_001:
̂That Ace truly is amazing! He doesn't look it, but he's incredibly
intelligent, and pretty good with those little claws!
ā
He's also remarkably good with machinery, as you've likely
already figured out!
CHILD_REO_BEAST_REBORN_MSG:
̂This place reminds
me of home.
ā
Maybe it's because of you or that
strange beast, Nochorin?
CITIZEN_MAN_A_MSG_002:
́ Recently, the elevator leading to B2 started working again.
ā
I've been planning on checking out what's down there...
ā
Maybe you could go check it out first, for us?
CITIZEN_MAN_A_MSG_003:
́I never thought in a million years, that I'd be able to attend
the Masters' GP with my son!
ā
He's all fired up, and inspired to become a Monster Master now!
CITIZEN_CHILD_A_MSG_003:
̂That Ace said he's going to build me my very own Reactor.
ā
As soon as I get it, I'm gonna train hard, and enter myself
into the Masters' GP!
CITIZEN_MAN_A_DEMO_918_AFT_MSG:
́I came with my son to see the
legendary Incarnus, Jester, that was revived!
ā
And now I feel relieved, y'know?
I'm sure the Djinn'll be taken care of!
CITIZEN_CHILD_A_DEMO_918_AFT_MSG:
̂The Insurgent Demons went searching for
the Djinn who vanished with the meteor back then.
CITIZEN_MAN_A_SPEED_CLEAR_AFT_MSG:
́I really knew what is on B2
all along.
ā
But Aroma's orders were to keep it a secret
until the time came. So I didn't spoil it.
CITIZEN_CHILD_A_SPEED_GP_AFT_MSG:
̂I feel like the monsters
outside are a lot nicer now.
ā
Maybe they'll be my friend?
I'm gonna be a Scout too!
KUKURI_BEAST_REBORN_MSG:
̂The Incarni sent word to my friends
in Pippit about finding something or other.
ā
Tiko's gonna really hate that I'm gone!
